I have been looking at posts made by religious people here where they submit evidence two support their arguments and found they fall into only two simple categories:
 
 1 - I have a funny feeling that god exits and that means god exists.
 
 2 – The bible says god exists and that means god exists.
 
 I challenge anyone to disprove what I am saying here not because I think I am right but because I am not perfect and would like to know if I missed something.
 
 I don't need to tell anyone capable of rational thought that these pieces of “evidence” are woefully inadequate.
 
 The thing I find most amazing is the huge volume of written words that they need to produce to say these two simple things.

Would you attempt to reason with a Jackass? Of course you wouldn't, so why would you ask me to do it? And I'm sorry for my insult to Jackasses every since they would probably be easier to reason with than the average atheist on this forum. emoticon_rolleyes
